item.title: Responsibilities of the Intro COS Lab Head Team.
item.description: Once a semester: interview Lab TAs hire interviewers schedule interviews use rubric schedule shifts During the semester: make announcements to students and Intro Lab TAs check attendance compile report to determine Lab TA job assiduity Once a year: hire next Intro COS Lab Head Team
